channel.title: Icon iStage MIDI-Drumpad - compatible?
channel.description:
Has anyone checked this one? http://www.bax-shop.de/icon-istage-midi-drumpad-weiss?gclid=CjwKEAjw-abABRDquOTJi8qdojwSJABt1S1ON8wuPKMRUWgeXNaiI-f-BemGRAJio9JAxrQkS4X3wRoC-3Lw_wcB
could make a great sequencer for 25 bucks but it has a built in usb hub, so maybe a reason not to work with axoloti?

item.title: Icon iStage MIDI-Drumpad - compatible?
item.dc:creator: @DazzlingDuke Daniel D Lindmark
item.description:
@DazzlingDuke wrote:

@Blindsmyth, I'm curious to see if the device works with the hub. Have you tried it?

Read full topic
